name: Law of the Cosmos
text: Your opponent can Set 1 Trap directly from their hand or Deck to their Spell & Trap Zone, and if they do, Special Summon 1 "Jinzo" from your Deck. Otherwise, add 1 "Jinzo", or 1 monster that specifically lists that name in its text, from your Deck to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Law of the Cosmos" per turn.
